comments: Essentially identical to A026817. - _R. J. Mathar_, May 28 2008
formula: a(n) = 11*n+a(n-1)-5 with n>0, a(0)=0. [_Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 04 2010]G.f.: x*(6+5*x)/(1-x)^3. - _Philippe Deléham_, Mar 27 2013a(n) = 3*a(n-1) -3*a(n-2) +a(n-3) with n>2, a(0)=0, a(1)=6, a(2)=23. - _Philippe Deléham_, Mar 27 2013a(n) = A218530(11n+5).
mathematica: s=0; lst={s}; Do[s+=n++ +6; AppendTo[lst, s], {n, 0, 500, 11}]; lst (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Nov 16 2008 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
